title: Long run similarity, perfect and monopolistic comp

content.question: Which of the following is true for both a monopolistically competitive firm and a perfectly competitive firm in long-run equilibrium?

choices.label: Marginal cost is greater than marginal revenue.
Price is greater than marginal cost.
Price is equal to average total cost.
Price is equal to marginal cost.
Marginal revenue is equal to average revenue.

content.answer: Price is equal to average total cost.

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe the similarities, differences, and limitations of economic concepts, principles, or models.
